data.title: Forwards and backwards
data.statement: You receive a string [[S]]. Reverse the order of the vowels (a, e, i, o, u, A, E, I, O, U) in the string

testCases.title: A sentence

data.outputDescription: The string with the vowels in reverse order.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You receive a string S. Reverse the order of the vowels (a, e, i, o, u, A, E, I, O, U) in the string
Input
Line 1: A string S
Output
The string with the vowels in reverse order.
Constraints
1 <= length of S <= 1000
Example
Input
hallo
Output
holla
